metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 8 - Financial Statements and Supplementary Data/Report of Ernst & Young LLP, Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm /
aws::graph::propositions: # Audit Opinion on Amazon.com, Inc. Financial Statements
Ernst & Young LLP audited the consolidated balance sheets of Amazon.com, Inc. as of December 31, 2024 and 2023.
Ernst & Young LLP audited the consolidated statements of operations of Amazon.com, Inc. for each of the three years in the period ended December 31, 2024.
Ernst & Young LLP audited the consolidated statements of comprehensive income (loss) of Amazon.com, Inc. for each of the three years in the period ended December 31, 2024.
Ernst & Young LLP audited the consolidated statements of stockholders' equity of Amazon.com, Inc. for each of the three years in the period ended December 31, 2024.
Ernst & Young LLP audited the consolidated statements of cash flows of Amazon.com, Inc. for each of the three years in the period ended December 31, 2024.
Ernst & Young LLP audited the related notes to Amazon.com, Inc.'s consolidated financial statements.
Ernst & Young LLP believes the consolidated financial statements present fairly the financial position of Amazon.com, Inc. at December 31, 2024 and 2023.
Ernst & Young LLP believes the consolidated financial statements present fairly the results of Amazon.com, Inc.'s operations for each of the three years in the period ended December 31, 2024.
Ernst & Young LLP believes the consolidated financial statements present fairly Amazon.com, Inc.'s cash flows for each of the three years in the period ended December 31, 2024.
The consolidated financial statements conform with U.S. generally accepted accounting principles.
Amazon.com, Inc. is referred to as "the Company" in the audit opinion.

metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 8 - Financial Statements and Supplementary Data/
/FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 8 - Financial Statements and Supplementary Data/Report of Ernst & Young LLP, Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm /

text:
##### Opinion on the Financial Statements

We have audited the accompanying consolidated balance sheets of Amazon.com, Inc. (the Company) as of December 31, 2024 and 2023, the related consolidated statements of operations, comprehensive income (loss), stockholders equity, and cash flows for each of the three years in the period ended December 31, 2024, and the related notes (collectively referred to as the consolidated financial statements). In our opinion, the consolidated financial statements present fairly, in all material respects, the financial position of the Company at December 31, 2024 and 2023, and the results of its operations and its cash flows for each of the three years in the period ended December 31, 2024, in conformity with U.S. generally accepted accounting principles.
